name: Smartarget Social – Contact Us
author: Smartarget

sections.description:
Let’s make it easier for your customers to contact you! Probably most of your users are using Whatsapp, so it’s time to give them the option to contact you by using Whatsapp.
With Smartarget Whatsapp – Contact Us you can add a small icon on the bottom-right corner with your phone number and short message as «Contact us» or «message us» etc. When the user clicks on the icon – a new tab will pop up with Whatsapp for web and chat window with you.
Whatsapp Contact Us plugin works also with WooCommerce, Elementor and Oxygen Builder.

Smartarget Social – Contact Us Pro Features:

Pro version overcomes your limitations with lite version of Smartarget Social – Contact Us.

Smartarget Social – Contact Us PRO Plugin Features

  • Apps visibility on all pages
  • No Smartarget label

BUY Smartarget Social – Contact Us Pro Features : Buy Now
sections.installation:
1. Unpack plugin zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Open plugin settings page
  4. Configure settings and press Save
sections.faq:
Where I can create Smartarget account

You can create account here: Smartarget.online
